senses.sense_definition: A small, smooth object, often a part of a shell, historically used to remove dust or debris from the eye.

examples.text: The old medical kit contained a smooth <w>eyestone</w> intended for clearing dust from the eye.
He placed the <w>eyestone</w> under his eyelid, hoping it would wash out the speck of dirt.

senses.sense_definition: A variety of agate stone with concentric rings that resemble an eye.

examples.text: The jeweler showed us a rare <w>eyestone</w> with perfect circular markings.
She found a beautiful <w>eyestone</w> on the beach and kept it as a lucky charm.
